findings.issue: Income elasticity defined as negative, but substitution effect also negative - typically opposite signs
Formula multiplies negative elasticity by positive ratio, but comment says this reduces labor supply

findings.quote: // Correct wage impact calculation by taking mean wage
findings.issue: Comment mentions correcting calculation but doesn't explain what was wrong before

findings.quote: poorer workers may reduce hours more
findings.issue: Contradicts economic theory - poorer workers typically have less elastic labor supply
Test expects negative range but doesn't validate that totalEffect calculation produces negative values

findings.quote: model doesn't capture potential productivity gains
findings.issue: Claims to not capture productivity but uses fixed wage rates which assumes no productivity change
